about_the_game:
SECOND-LOOP™ is a FPS action game with sandbox physics puzzle solving, — you're the robot pilot in the heart of a futuristic dystopian world. Control your Goliath in intense combat, and use your ability to manipulate gravity + assemble mechanical parts to solve physics puzzles.




• PHYSICS : Sandbox Physics Puzzle Solving

In the rain world where hope hangs by a thread, SECOND-LOOP™ bestows upon you, a hero mech pilot, an extraordinary gift: the power to bend the very fabric of reality. With gravity-defying abilities, manipulate objects - catch, lift, and reshape debris and components telekinetically.

But raw force is just the start. Use your abilities to disassemble and reassemble your surroundings into new constructions to overcome any obstacle. Unbounded by linear thinking, your imagination is the key.




• CREATION : Imagine It, Build It, Drive It.

From eccentric sports cars with tank treads to aircraft — if you can dream it, build it in SECOND-LOOP™. Craft any vehicle using machine parts, then take your outrageous creation for an unbridled test drive - soaring through the skies, racing down roads, or sailing across waves!




• VISUALS : Watch The Patter of Rain on Shattered Concrete

Immerse yourself in a hauntingly beautiful post-apocalyptic cityscape, where the remnants of a once-thriving metropolis, now drenched in an endless downpour, have long since blurred the boundaries between technology and nature.
Unreal Engine 5. Semi-body-cam. But no cops or ghosts.




• STORY : Be the Spark That Ignites the Revolution

In SECOND-LOOP™, you are not just a hero, but a symbol of resistance against the oppressive forces that seek to control the world. Your actions will inspire others to join the fight, leading to a climactic confrontation that will determine the future of humanity.




• COMBAT : Adrenaline-Fueled Against Brilliant AI Enemies

Engage in heart-pounding combat that puts you at the center of the action, facing off against advanced AI opponents that adapt to your playstyle and employ cunning strategies. Feel the rush of adrenaline as you dodge incoming fire, unleash devastating combo attacks.




• PILOT : Strap in and Carve Your Name in the History

Who hasn't dreamed of manning a towering robot war machine and cutting loose? Mech combat makes that power fantasy real with pulse-pounding, in-your-face gameplay. Brawl with enemy mechs using searing laser attacks and bone-crunching grapple throws. Let the heavy duty firepower rip in awe-inspiring barrages.




• ADD WISHLIST NOW!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6700XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: (optional) HOTAS support for the pilot.
